data.title: Fall of Freedom by Martin J Taylor
data.meta_description: Fall of Freedom by Martin J Taylor (ISBN: 9781908603876). Synposis: A fragile peace has lasted fifteen years since Lord Voltan Turiel ended the war. Due to his strength....
data.text:
A fragile peace has lasted fifteen years since Lord Voltan Turiel ended the war. Due to his strength no one would dare start another war but now he is getting on in years disturbances have been occurring with entire villages from several countries being wiped out. Rumours say it is monsters but such things donâ€™t exist so a peace summit has been set to find the true culprit and avoid an unnecessary war between suspicious neighbouring countries. Clive Garret in his first leadership role as royal guard must escort Prince Zack Hiram to the peace summit but on the way they encounter a village under attack and learn the horrific truth. Now they must get to the summit and reveal what they learned before they are silenced. The very fate of the planet hangs in the balance as a war far greater than anything before may begin if they fail.

ISBN: 9781908603876

Type: Paperback

Pages: 333

Published: 29 October 2011

Price: $14.50
